info.author: beyond 40 reviews
info.description:
Beyond 40 Reviews



 

Beyond 40, found online at Beyond40.com, is a nutritional supplement company that focuses on weight loss.

In a nutshell, the company sells three supplements that attack fat in different ways, including Lean Belly 3X a belly toning formula, Metabolic 6 a fat metabolizing formula and Carb Burn a blood sugar and insulin support supplement).

Beyond 40 was created by husband and wife team Shaun and Karen Hadsall. The two launched the company to help people achieve their best possible health. They believe in the power of natural supplements and solutions and aim to create supplements that help others.

Beyond 40 supplements work on people of any age. However, the supplements are particularly targeted towards men and women beyond age 40. Shaun and Karen Hadsall are in the best shape of their lives in their 50s. Their main intention with the supplement line is to share their success and supplements to help others achieve maximum fitness results at any age.

What is Lean Belly 3X?

All diet pills promise similar results, claiming to flatten the belly, help lose weight, and support other benefits – so what makes Lean Belly 3X different?

The supplement uses ingredients such as safflower seed oil, known to help accelerate weight loss results. Sunflower seed oil is rich with conjugated linoleic acid (CLA), which is linked to weight loss results.

Instead of flooding your body with caffeine, weird herbal extracts, and other formulas, Lean Belly 3X contains a single, powerful ingredient linked to weight loss results.

Let’s take a closer look at what you can expect while taking Lean Belly 3X.

Lean Belly 3X Ingredients

  • The full list of ingredients in Lean Belly 3X includes:
  • 1,500mg of safflower seed oil with 1,200mg of conjugated linoleic acid (CLA)
  • 5mg of BioPerine black pepper fruit extract
  • Other ingredients include gelatin, glycerin, purified water, and caramel color
  • You take two softgel capsules of Lean Belly 3X per day to support weight loss.


Lean Belly 3X Features & Benefits

Beyond 40 advertises all of the following features and benefits with Lean Belly 3X:

  • May accelerated fat burning
  • Increases the body’s absorption of fat-soluble nutrients
  • Black pepper extract to enhance the natural fat-releasing effects of CLA
  • Decrease body fat while increasing toned muscle
  • Support healthy overall body composition
  • Third-party tested for purity, potency, and safety

The formula is also free of caffeine, stimulants, and unusual herbal extracts. Many diet pills use artificial ingredients, stimulants, caffeine, and other ingredients to trick people into thinking they energize the body. With Lean Belly 3X, you get similar results without the added ingredients.

 

How Does Lean Belly 3X Work?

Lean Belly 3X contains just two active ingredients, including 1,500mg of safflower sed oil and 5mg of BioPerine black pepper extract.

The safflower seed oil contains an active ingredient called conjugated linoleic acid (CLA). Over a dozen studies have shown that CLA could help you burn weight and increase toned muscle, among other benefits.

Many supplements use black pepper extract to increase the absorption of nutrients. According to the formula, the black pepper extract in Lean Belly 3X enhances the absorption of CLA while also boosting its fat-releasing effects, according to Beyond 40.

 

Lean Belly 3X Pricing

Lean Belly 3X is priced at $59 per bottle, with discounts available for ordering multiple bottles at once. Each bottle contains 60 capsules or a 30 day supply.


 

Lean Belly 3X Refund Policy

Beyond 40 offers a 60-day money-back guarantee on all supplement purchases.

You can request a complete refund within 60 days of your original purchase date of Lean Belly 3X.

If you don’t lose a significant amount of weight within the first two months of taking Lean Belly 3X, or if you don’t experience a noticeable drop in belly fat, then you may be entitled to a complete refund.
